page.title: 15CWM FOREST.
page.content: This forest of approx.2sq km.lies to the N.E. of Rhuallt village. The following species of trees can be found:_ {SPRUCE_}Norway and Sitka. {LARCH_} European and Japanese. {PINE_} Scots, Corsican and Contorta. In addition,there are many hardwood trees which have self-seeded.These are {OAK, ASH}and{SYCAMORE.}There are also {HOLLY, MOUNTAIN ASH, BIRCH}and{SWEET {CHESTNUT.} The forest is owned by the Bodrhyddan Estates. Bodrhyddan Hall, Dyserth being the seat of Lord Langford,of the Rowley-Conwy family.
